outputs.output_descr:
This Initiation Plan aims to support the operationalization of the Growth and Poverty Reduction in the recently approved Country Programme Action Plan (CPAP) 2010-2014. The key activities under the initiation plan include capacity assessment of Implementing Partners, project formulation and preparation of project docoments and operationalising the programme, outcome and project boards.
 The expected outputs of the project are;
1.Five fully signed project documents
2.Completed capacity assessment reports for implementing partners.
3.Programme, Growth and Poverty Reduction outcome boards in place.

project_descr: This project has been initiated to support the development of Growth and Poverty Reduction Programme projects.
